Package com.foreach.across.core.context.info

Interface AcrossContextInfo

All Superinterfaces:
AcrossEntity
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConfigurableAcrossContextInfo
public interface AcrossContextInfo extends AcrossEntity
Holds the intermediate and final state of a running AcrossContext.

  • Method Details

    • getId

      String getId()
      Returns:
      The unique id of the AcrossContext.

    • getDisplayName

      String getDisplayName()
      Returns:
      The display name of the AcrossContext.

    • getContext

      AcrossContext getContext()
      Returns:
      The original AcrossContext.

    • getConfiguredModules

      Collection<AcrossModuleInfo> getConfiguredModules()
      Gets the collection of all modules that were configured in the context, even if they were disabled.
      Returns:
      Collection of AcrossModuleInfo instances.

    • getBootstrappedModules

      default Collection<AcrossModuleInfo> getBootstrappedModules()
      Gets the collection of modules that have fully bootstrapped. A bootstrapped module has its own ApplicationContext available.
      Returns:
      collection of module info instances

    • getModules

      Collection<AcrossModuleInfo> getModules()
      Gets the collection of all modules that were slated to be bootstrapped. These will include modules still to bootstrap, fully bootstrapped modules as well as modules with a ModuleBootstrapStatus.Skipped.
      Returns:
      Collection of AcrossModuleInfo instances.

    • hasModule

      boolean hasModule(String moduleName)
      Parameters:
      moduleName - Unique name of the module.
      Returns:
      True if the module with that name is configured on the context.

    • getModuleInfo

      AcrossModuleInfo getModuleInfo(String moduleName)
      Parameters:
      moduleName - Unique name of the module.
      Returns:
      AcrossModuleInfo instance or null if not present.

    • getModuleBeingBootstrapped

      AcrossModuleInfo getModuleBeingBootstrapped()
      Returns:
      AcrossModuleInfo instance of null if bootstrap finished.

    • isBootstrapped

      boolean isBootstrapped()
      Returns:
      True if the AcrossContext is bootstrapped, false if bootstrap in progress.

    • getApplicationContext

      org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext getApplicationContext()
      Returns:
      The Spring application context for this Across context.

    • getBootstrapConfiguration

      AcrossBootstrapConfig getBootstrapConfiguration()
      Returns:
      Configuration object used for bootstrapping the AcrossContext.

    • getModuleIndex

      int getModuleIndex(String moduleName)
      Parameters:
      moduleName - Unique name of the module.
      Returns:
      Index of the module in the context bootstrap, max integer if not found.

    • getModuleIndex

      int getModuleIndex(AcrossModule module)
      Parameters:
      module - AcrossModule instance to lookup the index for.
      Returns:
      Index of the module in the context bootstrap, max integer if not found.

    • getModuleIndex

      int getModuleIndex(AcrossModuleInfo moduleInfo)
      Parameters:
      moduleInfo - AcrossModuleInfo instance to lookup the index for.
      Returns:
      Index of the module in the context bootstrap, max integer if not found.

    • getExposedBeanDefinitions

      Map<String,ExposedBeanDefinition> getExposedBeanDefinitions()
      Exposed beans on an AcrossContext are beans pushed to the parent context.
      Returns:
      The collection of exposed BeanDefinitions.
